Package frames.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Grabber
    Grabbers are means to attach a user-space object to all the Agents (see Agent.addGrabber(Grabber)) through which it's going to be handled.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    Agents gather data from different sources --mostly from input devices such touch surfaces or simple mice-- and reduce them into a rather simple but quite 'useful' set of interface events (Event) for third party objects (Grabber objects) to consume them (Agent.handle(Event)).
    Event
    The root of all events that are to be handled by an Agent.
    GrabberObject
    Grabber object which eases third-party implementation of the Grabber interface.
    InputHandler
    The InputHandler object is the high level package handler which holds a collection of InputHandler.agents(), and an event dispatcher queue of Tuples (InputHandler.tupleQueue()).
    Shortcut
    Every Event instance has a shortcut which represents a gesture-Shortcut.id().
    Tuple
    A [Event,Grabber] tuple.
